page.title: 10MEALS ON WHEELS
page.content: {Meals on Wheels. -------------------------------------- Helping the aged and housebound is one of the {social concerns }of the area.The Bassingham scheme of "Meals on Wheels" is organised by the WRVS. Many{elderly}people in Bassingham and surrounding villages benefit from this service.They receive two hot meals a week,on Tuesdays and Thursdays, costing 74p each. The meals are delivered on a {voluntary}basis by ladies from the surrounding villages.They are called to do this duty every six weeks. The meals are cooked at RAF Swinderby,put into a heated oven and delivered by car. --------------------------------------
